Author: koicartel
Text: Nostalgia’s a hell of a drug; it can make some pretty nasty shit seem a lot more tragically beautiful and appealing than it really was.  Think about what it’s like to be strong and energised and truly alive. Is that better than being barely conscious, permanently exhausted, weak, freezing, depressed?  You spent so much of recovery letting your body receive the care it needs to thrive, and you deserve to keep experiencing life at its fullest rather than confining yourself to a scale!  Recovery isn’t about getting bigger, it’s about growing ;)
